TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit HostSecurityManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 允許控制及自訂應用程式定義域的安全性行為。

span.span: Allows the control and customization of security behavior for application domains.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立新，通用語言執行階段查詢是否存在，其中參與做出安全性決策。When you create a new , the common language runtime queries the for the presence of a , which participates in making security decisions for the . 主機提供者應該實作繼承自主機安全性管理員類別。Host providers should implement a host security manager that inherits from the class. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的簡單實作。The following example shows a very simple implementation of a . [!code-csharp[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/CS/customsecuritymanager.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/VB/customsecuritymanager.vb#1)]

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫端。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個類別不能由部分信任或不透明的程式碼。

span.span: This class cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 這個類別無法繼承由部分信任的程式碼。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

span.para: 某些成員時隱含或明確地載入組件，是被呼叫。並方法必須載入任何組件，因為這樣會導致成員正在以遞迴方式呼叫。若要避免循環參考，您應該建立可能會導致要載入組件，隱含或明確地衍生自類別的建構函式中的類別的新執行個體。

Some members of a are called whenever an assembly is loaded, either implicitly or explicitly. The and methods must not load any assemblies, because doing so will result in the members of the being recursively called. To avoid circular references, you should create new instances of classes that can cause assemblies to be loaded, either implicitly or explicitly, in the constructor of a class that derives from .

for full trust for inheritors.

span.para: 建立可以將組件載入，明確或隱含，導致這個建構函式的類別的執行個體。Get 存取子屬性和和組件已載入，和其後續載入組件會導致循環參考時，會呼叫方法。

Create instances of classes that can cause assemblies to be loaded, either explicitly or implicitly, in this constructor. The get accessor for the property and the and methods are called whenever an assembly is loaded, and their subsequent loading of assemblies will cause circular references.

Public Overridable Function DetermineApplicationTrust (applicationEvidence As Evidence, activatorEvidence As Evidence, context As TrustManagerContext) As ApplicationTrust

public: virtual System::Security::Policy::ApplicationTrust ^ DetermineApplicationTrust(System::Security::Policy::Evidence ^ applicationEvidence, System::Security::Policy::Evidence ^ activatorEvidence, System::Security::Policy::TrustManagerContext ^ context);

abstract member DetermineApplicationTrust : System.Security.Policy.Evidence * System.Security.Policy.Evidence * System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext -> System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust override this.DetermineApplicationTrust : System.Security.Policy.Evidence * System.Security.Policy.Evidence * System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext -> System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust

param.name: applicationEvidence
param.span: 要啟動之應用程式的辨識項。

span.span: The evidence for the application to be activated.

param.name: activatorEvidence
param.span: 或者，啟動中應用程式定義域的辨識項。

span.span: Optionally, the evidence for the activating application domain.
The trust context.

summary.span: 決定是否應該執行應用程式。

span.span: Determines whether an application should be executed.

returns.span: 包含應用程式相關信任資訊的物件。

span.span: An object that contains trust information about the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生類別可以覆寫此方法。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 基底實作呼叫來判斷是否應該執行的應用程式的應用程式安全性管理員。The base implementation calls the application security manager to determine if the application should be executed. 基底實作不會使用啟動程式辨識項。The base implementation does not use the activator evidence. 不過，覆寫的實作也可以使用啟動程式辨識項，來判斷嘗試啟動應用程式的應用程式定義域的安全性辨識項。However, an overridden implementation could use the activator evidence to determine the security evidence for the application domain attempting to activate the application. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何覆寫自訂主機安全性管理員的方法。The following example shows how to override the method for a custom host security manager. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/CS/customsecuritymanager.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/VB/customsecuritymanager.vb#3)]

-or-

span.span: The grant set does not contain the minimum request set specified by the .

.property instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel DomainPolicy
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property DomainPolicy As PolicyLevel

member this.DomainPolicy : System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("AppDomain policy levels are obsolete and will be removed in a future release of the .NET Framework. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=155570 for more information.")

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得目前應用程式定義域的安全性原則。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the security policy for the current application domain.

value.span: 目前應用程式定義域的安全性原則。

span.span: The security policy for the current application domain.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以在衍生類別中被覆寫。This property can be overridden in a derived class. 這個基底實作一定會傳回 `null`。The base implementation always returns `null`. 這個屬性會在呼叫建立時間。This property is called at creation time. 它可讓主機提供目前的原則。It allows a host to supply a policy for the current . 原則層級是由下列項目所組成：A policy level consists of the following: - 一組程式碼群組會組織成單一的根樹狀結構。A set of code groups organized into a single rooted tree. - 一組具名使用權限集合所參考的指定權限授與程式碼群組所屬的程式碼的程式碼群組。A set of named permission sets that are referenced by the code groups to specify permissions to be granted to code belonging to the code group. - 完全信任組件清單。A list of fully trusted assemblies. > [!IMPORTANT] > 請參閱針對繼承者注意事項重要的實作資訊的類別。See the Notes to Inheritors for the class for critical implementation information.

exception.span: 此方法使用在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 中已過時的程式碼存取安全性 (CAS) 原則。

span.span: This method uses code access security (CAS) policy, which is obsolete in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)].

exception.span: 若要啟用 CAS 原則對舊版 .NET Framework 的相容性，請使用 [<legacyCasPolicy> 項目](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md)。

span.span: To enable CAS policy for compatibility with earlier versions of the .NET Framework, use the [<legacyCasPolicy> element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md).

summary.span: 取得旗標，表示主機的重要安全性原則元件。

span.span: Gets the flag representing the security policy components of concern to the host.

value.span: 其中一個列舉值，指定安全性原則元件。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies security policy components.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以在衍生類別中被覆寫。This property can be overridden in a derived class. 這個基底實作一定會傳回 。The base implementation always returns . 在衍生的主應用程式可以變更值，這個屬性的子集時感興趣。The derived host can change the value of this property when only a subset of the is of interest. 可能的子集包括無、 拒絕的集合，原則層級和組件辨識項。The possible subsets include none, the refused set, the policy level, and assembly evidence. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何覆寫自訂主機安全性管理員的屬性。The following example shows how to override the property for a custom host security manager. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/CS/customsecuritymanager.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/VB/customsecuritymanager.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase GenerateAppDomainEvidence (Type evidenceType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase GenerateAppDomainEvidence(class System.Type evidenceType) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GenerateAppDomainEvidence (evidenceType As Type) As EvidenceBase
public: virtual System::Security::Policy::EvidenceBase ^ GenerateAppDomainEvidence(Type ^ evidenceType);
abstract member GenerateAppDomainEvidence : Type -> System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase override this.GenerateAppDomainEvidence : Type -> System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase

span.span: The evidence type.

summary.span: 針對應用程式定義域要求特定辨識項型別。

span.span: Requests a specific evidence type for the application domain.

returns.span: 要求的應用程式定義域辨識項。

span.span: The requested application domain evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生類別可以覆寫此方法。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 基底實作傳回`null`。The base implementation returns `null`. 當目前需要指定型別的辨識項時，通用語言執行平台會呼叫這個方法。The common language runtime calls this method when evidence of the specified type is needed for the current . 傳回的值做為主機提供的辨識項，而且會儲存在的集合屬性。The returned value is used as host-supplied evidence, and is stored in the collection of the property. 您可以使用方法，以從集合中取得所產生的辨識項。You can use the method to obtain the generated evidence from the collection. 若要取得這個方法的回呼，主機必須指定加上旗標在屬性。To get a callback to this method, hosts must specify the flag in the property. 產生的辨識項的這個方法可讓主機以延遲的辨識項產生直到需要為止的辨識項。This method of generating evidence allows hosts to delay evidence generation for an until the evidence is needed. 在.NET Framework 3.5 版和更早版本中，則需要提供在載入時，藉由覆寫的辨識項方法。In the .NET Framework version 3.5 and earlier versions, it was necessary to provide evidence at load time by overriding the method. 我們建議您改用提供辨識項，而不是覆寫。We recommend that you use to provide evidence instead of overriding . 方法會回撥到只適用於類型的主控件的覆寫中指定的辨識項方法。The method is called back into only for types of evidence that the host has specified in the override of the method. 傳回值為`null`指出主應用程式無法產生此特定型別的辨識項。A return value of `null` indicates that the host cannot generate evidence of this specific type. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何覆寫自訂主機安全性管理員的方法。The following example shows how to override the method for a custom host security manager. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/CS/customsecuritymanager.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/VB/customsecuritymanager.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase GenerateAssemblyEvidence (Type evidenceType, System.Reflection.Assembly assembly);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase GenerateAssemblyEvidence(class System.Type evidenceType, class System.Reflection.Assembly assembly) cil managed
public: virtual System::Security::Policy::EvidenceBase ^ GenerateAssemblyEvidence(Type ^ evidenceType, System::Reflection::Assembly ^ assembly);

abstract member GenerateAssemblyEvidence : Type * System.Reflection.Assembly -> System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase override this.GenerateAssemblyEvidence : Type * System.Reflection.Assembly -> System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase

span.span: The evidence type.
The target assembly.

summary.span: 針對組件要求特定辨識項型別。

span.span: Requests a specific evidence type for the assembly.
The requested assembly evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生類別可以覆寫此方法。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 基底實作傳回`null`。The base implementation returns `null`. 指定型別的辨識項需要目前組件時，通用語言執行平台會呼叫這個方法。The common language runtime calls this method when evidence of the specified type is needed for the current assembly. 傳回的值做為主機提供的辨識項，而且會儲存在屬性。The returned value is used as host-supplied evidence, and is stored in the property. 您可以使用方法，以取得從產生的辨識項屬性。You can use the method to obtain the generated evidence from the property. 若要取得這個方法的回呼，主機必須指定加上旗標在屬性。To get a callback to this method, hosts must specify the flag in the property. 產生的辨識項的這個方法可讓主機以延遲的辨識項產生直到需要為止的辨識項。This method of generating evidence allows hosts to delay evidence generation for an until the evidence is needed. 在.NET Framework 3.5 和更早版本中，則需要提供在載入時，藉由覆寫的辨識項方法。In the .NET Framework 3.5 and earlier versions, it was necessary to provide evidence at load time by overriding the method. 我們建議您改用提供辨識項，而不是覆寫。We recommend that you use to provide evidence instead of overriding . 方法會回撥到只適用於類型的主控件的覆寫中指定的辨識項方法。The method is called back into only for types of evidence that the host has specified in the override of the method. 傳回值為`null`指出主應用程式無法產生此特定型別的辨識項。A return value of `null` indicates that the host cannot generate evidence of this specific type.

summary.span: 判斷主機可為應用程式定義域提供的辨識項型別 (如有要求的話)。

span.span: Determines which evidence types the host can supply for the application domain, if requested.
An array of evidence types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生類別可以覆寫此方法。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 基底實作傳回`null`。The base implementation returns `null`. 這個方法所傳回的型別決定是否傳回至呼叫方法。The types returned by this method determine whether the method is called back into. 這份清單中的類型存在並不表示主機必須能夠產生此辨識項型別，但它可能可以。The presence of a type in this list does not mean that the host must be able to generate this evidence type, but that it may be able to. 基於這個理由，最好是過度指定，而不是在-指定此清單中的類型。For that reason, it is best to over-specify rather than under-specify the types in this list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以在衍生類別中被覆寫。This method can be overridden in a derived class. 會呼叫這個方法時建立物件。This method is called whenever an object is created. `inputEvidence`參數是從 common language runtime 計算的辨識項。The `inputEvidence` parameter is the computed evidence from the common language runtime. 主應用程式實作可以選擇擴充或縮減的辨識項。The host implementation can choose to extend or reduce the evidence. 傳回的值是要用於應用程式定義域的辨識項。The return value is the evidence to be used for the application domain. 基底實作一定會傳回傳入做為辨識項物件`inputEvidence`參數。The base implementation always returns the evidence object passed in as the `inputEvidence` parameter. > [!IMPORTANT] > 請參閱針對繼承者注意事項重要的實作資訊的類別。See the Notes to Inheritors for the class for critical implementation information.

summary.span: 根據指定的辨識項，判斷授與程式碼的權限。

span.span: Determines what permissions to grant to code based on the specified evidence.

returns.span: 可由安全性系統授與的使用權限集合。

span.span: The permission set that can be granted by the security system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會叫用安全性原則引擎，其提供指定的辨識項。This method invokes the security policy engine, providing it with the specified evidence. 結果是由安全性原則決定。The result is determined by the security policy.

span.span: is .
